text: The Battle of Beit Imrin occurred on September 29, 1936, when British forces besieged Arab forces operating under the command of Fawzi al-Qawuqji while in the village. The rebels withdrew after receiving heavy losses estimated at 42 dead. ==References== Category:1936–1939 Arab revolt in Palestine Category:1936 in Mandatory Palestine
title: Battle of Beit Imrin
